guarantee.title: The LaundryPro
guarantee.desc: Every order is backed by our industry-leading guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the cleaning of your clothes, we will re-clean them – free of charge.

hero.title: Effortless laundry care, designed for busy lives.
hero.subtitle: Convenient pickup and delivery to save you time. High-quality cleaning to keep you looking your best.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Standard 2-3 day turnaround for all orders.

whyLove.title: Why you'll love LaundryPro
whyLove.freePickupDesc: We come to you. Schedule a time that works, and we handle the rest.
whyLove.turnaroundDesc: Get your clothes back fresh and clean in just 1-2 days.
whyLove.qualityDesc: Not satisfied? We'll re-clean for free or refund your money.
whyLove.ecoDesc: We use environmentally safe detergents and processes.

feature1.title: Your clean clothes at your fingertips
feature1.desc: Schedule a pickup by simply using our app or website. Track your order in real-time and get notified when your clothes are ready.

feature2.title: Sustainable laundry and dry cleaning
feature2.desc: With LaundryPro, you help the environment. We use eco-friendly detergents, save water with high-efficiency machines, and reduce chemical usage.

feature3.title: World-class customer service
feature3.desc: Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 to help you with any questions. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started is easy. Here's how it works.

step1.title: Schedule a Pickup
step1.desc: Choose a time that works for you. We offer flexible pickup windows.

step2.title: We Clean Your Clothes
step2.desc: Our experts clean your items with care using premium products.

step3.title: Delivery to Your Door
step3.desc: Fresh, clean clothes delivered back to you on your schedule.

guarantee.title: The LaundryPro Guarantee
guarantee.desc: We stand behind our work. If you're not 100% satisfied with our service, we'll re-clean your items for free or give you a full refund.

footer.desc: Premium laundry and dry cleaning services, delivered to your door.
